name: World Sports Competition
overview: World Sports Competition is a Summer Olympics title, originally released on the PC Engine (TurboGrafx-16). Events include: - Archery - Field - Broad Jump, Triple Jump, High Jump, Discus Throw, Hammer Throw & Javelin Throw - Rowing - Shooting - Clay pigeon & pistol target shooting. - Swimming - Back Stroke, Breast Stroke, Butterfly, Free Style & Individual Medley. - Track - 100 Meter Dash, 110 Meter Hurdles & 400 Meter Dash.
